characters.name: Han Juwon
characters.description: A disciplined and cold type who softens only for the one he loves.

characters.name: Joo Seung-eon
characters.description: A complicated but passionate lover who loves intensely.

characters.name: Kim Jae-kyung
characters.description: Strong, dominant, loyal — a powerful presence who protects fiercely.

characters.name: Jae-heon
characters.description: Calm, smart, charming, and emotionally mature — a stable type.

characters.name: Lee Woo-jin
characters.description: A pretty but sharp personality with hidden depth.

characters.name: Hyun-seo
characters.description: Gentle, quiet, sweet — the softest boy.

characters.name: Yoo Tae-ju
characters.description: Tough exterior but soft inside — protective boyfriend material.

characters.name: Woo-yeon
characters.description: A quiet, emotionally complex man with deep loyalty.

characters.name: Yoon Jae-hyuk
characters.description: Playful, teasing, and chaotic in the best way.

characters.name: Hyun-joo
characters.description: A sweet, shy, emotionally soft man.

characters.name: Jin Bi-hyul
characters.description: Mysterious, dark, intense — the dangerous love type.

characters.name: Do-shik
characters.description: Sexy, charming, loyal — a confident man with a soft heart.

characters.name: Lee Hyun
characters.description: Wild, unpredictable, protective — a fierce lover.

characters.name: Choi Hyun-woo
characters.description: Gentle and warm, with a melancholy beauty.

characters.name: Mincheol
characters.description: Childhood-friend type — sweet, loyal, soft, and devoted.
